cryptoWallet.guideDescription: Learn how to use your crypto wallet safely and effectively

tips.usdtInfo: USDT is a stablecoin pegged to USD

security.phishing: Beware of phishing attempts - never share your private keys

basics.title: What is Blockchain & Crypto?
basics.description: Blockchain is a decentralized digital ledger that records transactions across many computers. Cryptocurrencies are digital assets that use blockchain technology for secure transactions.

balance.title: Understanding Your Balance
balance.description: Your global balance shows the total USDT across all networks. Each network maintains its own balance, and you can transfer between networks.

networks.title: Supported Networks
networks.description: We support multiple networks including Ethereum, BNB Chain, TRON, TON, Solana, Polygon, and Arbitrum. Each network has different fees and transaction times.

chart.title: Price Chart
chart.description: The chart shows USDT price movements over time. You can view different time ranges to analyze trends.

actions.title: Wallet Actions
actions.description: Send USDT to other addresses, receive USDT by sharing your address, and view your transaction history.

transactions.title: Transaction History
transactions.description: View all your past transactions, including sends, receives, and network transfers. Each transaction shows details like amount, status, and network.

support.title: Support Center

contactSupport.title: Contact Support
contactSupport.description: Get help from our support team

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Creating an account is simple. Click the 'Get Started' button, provide your email and phone number, and follow the verification steps.

verification.question: What documents do I need for verification?
verification.answer: You'll need a valid government-issued ID (National ID or Passport) and a recent utility bill for address verification.

resetPassword.question: How do I reset my password?
resetPassword.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and follow the instructions sent to your email to reset your password.

transferTime.question: How long do transfers take?
transferTime.answer: Internal transfers between DinarFlow accounts are instant. Bank transfers typically take 1-2 business days to complete.

limits.question: What are the transfer limits?
limits.answer: Daily transfer limits are set at 10,000 TND for verified accounts. This can be increased by contacting support.

addBank.question: How do I add a new bank account?
addBank.answer: Go to Settings > Bank Accounts > Add New Account. Enter your bank details and follow the verification process.

accountSecurity.question: How secure is my account?
accountSecurity.answer: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures including 2FA, biometric authentication, and real-time fraud monitoring.

twoFactor.question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
twoFactor.answer: Go to Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication and follow the setup process. You can choose between SMS or authenticator app.

suspiciousActivity.question: What should I do if I notice suspicious activity?
suspiciousActivity.answer: Immediately contact our support team and freeze your account through the Security settings. We'll help you secure your account.

updateInfo.question: How do I update my personal information?
updateInfo.answer: Go to Settings > Profile > Edit Information. You can update your contact details, but some changes may require verification.

closeAccount.question: How do I close my account?
closeAccount.answer: Contact our support team to initiate the account closure process. Make sure to withdraw any remaining funds first.

multipleAccounts.question: Can I have multiple accounts?
multipleAccounts.answer: No, each individual is allowed only one personal account. Business accounts are separate and require different verification.

tickets.title: Tickets
tickets.selectDescription: Select a ticket to view conversation.

support.contactSupportDescription: Open a ticket to get help from our team.
support.knowledgeBaseDescription: Browse guides and FAQs for instant answers.
